subject: Re: [junit] Re: How can I test a method with @Test in a method?
msgSnippet: 2009/4/27 johnsu123 : Your english is fine so far. :) I think what we need is elaboration on ... What do you want to simplify, how are you
messageBody:
2009/4/27 johnsu123 <johnsu123@...>:

Your english is fine so far. :) I think what we need is elaboration on
the following point:

> If I wanna immplement the function I expected above, what shall I do? Why I
> wanna the function? Because I wanna use reflect machanism to simplify the
> whole test in our project.

What do you want to simplify, how are you going to use reflection to
do it, and how is the (expected) behavior above in your way?

Cheers, Ilja
